System Requirements.

ProShow Producer will run on most modern Windows systems. As with any multimedia software, the performance you see in ProShow will depend on your system.

Minimum Requirements:

1024 x 768 display
1GHz+ processor
1GB system memory; (2 GB recommended)
Accelerated 3D graphics Ã¢â‚¬â€œ 64MB ram

4GB system memory or more
Accelerated 3D graphics Ã¢â‚¬â€œ 512MB ram or higher

Optional Requirements:

For Blu-ray output, a Blu-ray writer is required. Additional RAM and free hard drive space is also recommended.
